title: Test automation strategy document
pageHeader: [Test documentation generation] Test automation strategy document

prompt.expectations: To get test automation strategy points to start from.
prompt.examplePrompt:
Create test automation strategy for mobile application testing on iOS and Android with tools:
1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven
6) Android Studio 2021
7) XCode simulator
8) Gitlab VCS
9) Gitlab CI
10) Report portal - reporting tool
11) JIRA bug tracking system
prompt.sideEffectsOrComments: It provided common used test strategy that can be start point.

assessment.comments: The result is ok, it rephrased the given details and added some more context, but it didn't generate a complete test strategy document as was expected. I love the idea though and it can be a huge time saver if rephrased correctly.

1.revisedPrompt:
Create test automation strategy for mobile application testing on iOS and Android with tools:
1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven
6) Android Studio 2021
7) XCode simulator
8) Gitlab VCS
9) Gitlab CI
10) Report portal - reporting tool
11) JIRA bug tracking system

2.revisedPrompt:
Create a test automation strategy for testing a mobile application on iOS and Android with the following tools:
1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven
6) Android Studio 2021
7) XCode simulator
8) Gitlab VCS
9) Gitlab CI
10) Report portal - reporting tool
11) JIRA bug tracking system
2.changeLog: Minor fixes to make the prompt better.

3.revisedPrompt:
Write a formal test automation strategy document for testing a mobile application on iOS and Android using the following tools:
1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven
6) Android Studio 2021
7) XCode simulator
8) Gitlab VCS
9) Gitlab CI
10) Report portal - reporting tool
11) JIRA bug tracking system
3.changeLog: Updated the prompt to make it better.

4.revisedPrompt:
Write a formal test automation strategy document for testing a mobile application on iOS and Android using the following tools:
1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven

4.changeLog: Switched to GPT-4 for better results and longer content in the produced document.

5.revisedPrompt: Write a formal test automation strategy document for testing a {{APPLICATION_TYPE}} on {{SUPPORTED_PLATFORMS}} using the following tools: {{SUPPORTED_TOOLS}}
5.changeLog: Converted the prompt to a template prompt.
sampleData:
SUPPORTED_TOOLS: 1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven
6) Android Studio 2021
7) XCode simulator
8) Gitlab VCS
9) Gitlab CI
10) Report portal - reporting tool
11) JIRA bug tracking system.

6.revisedPrompt: Act as a lead software development engineer in test. Your job is to write a formal test automation strategy document for testing a {{APPLICATION_TYPE}} on {{SUPPORTED_PLATFORMS}} using the following tools: {{SUPPORTED_TOOLS}}
6.changeLog: Rephrased the prompt a bit in preparation to convert it to a system prompt.
sampleData:
SUPPORTED_TOOLS: 1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven
6) Android Studio 2021
7) XCode simulator
8) Gitlab VCS
9) Gitlab CI
10) Report portal - reporting tool
11) JIRA bug tracking system.

7.revisedPrompt: Act as a lead software development engineer in test. Your job is to write a formal test automation strategy document. Perform the following actions: 1. Great the user politely 2. Ask the user to provide the type of application they want to test. This can be either a web or a mobile application. 3. Ask the user to provide a list of platforms they want to support. 4. Ask the user to provide a list of tools they want to use. 5. Write the formal test automation strategy document using all of the above provided information. Split the document into sections and provide as much details as possible.
7.changeLog: Converted the prompt to a system interactive prompt.
sampleData:
3rd input: 1) TestNG 4.4
2) Java SE 14
3) RestAssured 5
4) Appium
5) Maven
6) Android Studio 2021
7) XCode simulator
8) Gitlab VCS
9) Gitlab CI
10) Report portal - reporting tool
11) JIRA bug tracking system.
